40c6a814-ee0d-4cea-84e9-d0848f023d17.name: Eugster et al., Physiological and pathogenic T cell autoreactivity converge in type 1 diabetes

d7098869-c88c-4578-a5d6-d3143d4cf563.name: Control
d7098869-c88c-4578-a5d6-d3143d4cf563.inclusion_criteria: T1D: include diagnosed less than 12 months ago. HD: exclude history of autoimmune diseases

e16f0c7a-a83a-4c8a-a83e-d985ed060a2a.name: Case (T1D)
e16f0c7a-a83a-4c8a-a83e-d985ed060a2a.inclusion_criteria: T1D: include diagnosed less than 12 months ago. HD: exclude history of autoimmune diseases

313489ad-691b-4d65-8838-ae1f460c5f97.cell_isolation: Cells were stained with fluorochrome labeled antibodies and then sorted on a BD FACSAria II flow cytometer
313489ad-691b-4d65-8838-ae1f460c5f97.cell_processing_protocol: Fresh PBMCs were stimulated with whole GAD, live CD4+ CD154+ CD69+ cells single cell sorted into 96-well plates contaning RNAse-DNase-free PBS, snap-frozen in dry ice and stored at -80C until RT-PCR and PCR procedures

a88e7c13-76d5-41a8-855f-32ca47ffe86b.library_generation_protocol: Sorted cells. Then cDNA was synthesized directly from single cells using qScript cDNA Supermix (Quanta Biosciences). A first round of PCR was done on all cDNA using TATAA GrandMaster Mix in the presence of a mix of 31 tagged (HTSP-“tag”) variable region primers covering all subgroups of TCR Vα and Vβ genes, an alpha constant region primer, a beta constant region primer and 96 primers for preamplification of 48 genes of interest, including cytokines, transcription factors, chemokines and lineage markers. A second round PCR was performed separately for TCRA and TCRB on 3 μl of the first round product, using the HTSP-“tag”-primer and a nested constant region primer (for alpha or beta, depending on the PCR reaction), with Takara ExTaq. The PCR products were Sanger sequenced using the HTSP-tag primer

ec9790ff-f668-4f6b-bf76-ef9de8c56707.library_generation_protocol: Sorted cells. Then cDNA was synthesized directly from single cells using qScript cDNA Supermix (Quanta Biosciences). A first round of PCR was done on all cDNA using TATAA GrandMaster Mix in the presence of a mix of 31 tagged (HTSP-“tag”) variable region primers covering all subgroups of TCR Vα and Vβ genes, an alpha constant region primer, a beta constant region primer and 96 primers for preamplification of 48 genes of interest, including cytokines, transcription factors, chemokines and lineage markers. A second round PCR was performed separately for TCRA and TCRB on 3 μl of the first round product, using the HTSP-“tag”-primer and a nested constant region primer (for alpha or beta, depending on the PCR reaction), with Takara ExTaq. The PCR products were Sanger sequenced using the HTSP-tag primer
